title: Yu Shang Food, Inc. Recalls Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor’s Note: December 5, 2024 - Further testing determined that the product and environmental samples collected by FSIS are genetically related to samples collected from ill people with Listeria monocytogenes. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Food Safety Alert, Listeria Outbreak Linked to Ready-to-Eat...
